snippet: A Sports Illustrated internal spreadsheet suggests that journalists facing layoffs were rated on whether their work benefited advertisers, among other factors.
abstract: Internal document from Time Inc shows that Sports Illustrated rated its journalists on whether their work benefited advertisers; criterion was one of eight used by company in deciding which staff members to lay off.
lead_paragraph: A Sports Illustrated internal spreadsheet suggests that journalists facing layoffs were rated on whether their work benefited advertisers, among other factors.

headline.main: Advertiser-Friendliness May Have Played Role in Time Inc. Layoffs
